product_name: Lost Horizons Chelsea Leg Warmers - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The warm Lost Horizons wool leg warmers, handcrafted in Nepal, offer a unique look that will goes well with any cold-weather outfit. Wool is a natural insulator: warm, soft and breathable to keep you comfortable in the great outdoors. Dry clean or hand wash in cold water; lay flat to dry. Special buy.
short_description: The warm Lost Horizons wool leg warmers, handcrafted in Nepal, offer a unique look that will goes well with any cold-weather outfit.
